snippet: Instead of further militarization of our southern border, we need to invest in the movement of people and goods through our land ports.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Ei Paso, Tex, county Judge Veronica Escobar warns focus on enforcement in debate about comprehensive immigration reform is ill-advised because it deprives America's international ports of entry, like El Paso, of federal resources; calls for more investment in land ports of entry, rather than further militarization of borders.
lead_paragraph: Instead of further militarization of our southern border, we need to invest in the movement of people and goods through our land ports.
